title: Patch 9
content:

Patch notes related to community-reported issues and feedback are indicated with an asterisk. Like this.*

Added the Paladin Class with the Oath of the Ancients and Oath of Devotion subclasses. Increased the level cap to Level 5. Added the Fly spell. Revamped the Reactions system. Rebalanced combat encounters in late Act 1. Added new Spells and Spell Scrolls.
